nodes.text: Block 135 was a cityblock in the Kesk Cityblock on the planet Brentaal IV. By 0 ABY, it was a small commercial shopping district that supplied the wants and needs of the local populace. Like the rest of Kesk Cityblock, it was serviced by a large mass transit system. The Jovvitz, an abandoned nightclub located in Block 135, was the site where Alliance to Restore the Republic privateers from the frigate Far Orbit met with an Alliance contact to retrieve a sensitive datadisc, and where Imperial Security Bureau agents tracked the privateers to before attacking them.

Block 135 appeared in Raid on Brentaal, an adventure scenario in 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and had the same theme of the previous publication Pirates & Privateers, as it followed the privateering frigate Far Orbit in its adventures.
